title: Clara Rockmore - The Art of the Theremin
description:
The Art of the Theremin is the first official album by theremin virtuoso Clara Rockmore, and the only one released in her lifetime. It was produced by Robert Moog and his first wife, Shirleigh Moog and was released in 1977 by Delos International Records. As with most of her live performances, she was accompanied minimally by her older sister Nadia Reisenberg on piano.
